DOC.HEADLINE: BRIEFLY ; GOVERNMENT : 2 WESTSIDERS APPOINTED TO COUNTY POSTS
DOC.TEXT: Supervisor Ed Edelman has named two Westside residents to Los Angeles County commissions . Brentwood resident Fredric Halperin has been appointed to the Los Angeles Convention and Exhibition Center Authority Commission . Halperin , president of the National Assn . of Real_Estate Investment Managers , will join the 15-member commission to help supervise the construction and operation of a convention center . Phalen G . Hurewitz , a resident of Beverly Hills , will serve on the Los Angeles County Commission for Children ' s Services . An attorney and partner with the Beverly Hills firm of Manatt , Phelps & Phillip , Hurewitz is a specialist in copyright and entertainment law . As a commission member , he will review all county-administered children ' s programs .
